title: rasengan

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Quote from: rasengan on December 16, 2022, 11:32:51 PMEnds Dec 23, 2022 4:00 pm US PSThttps://www.timeanddate.com/countdown/to?iso=20221223T16&p0=137&msg=Auction&ud=1&font=cursiveStarting price: 2 BTCMinimum bidding increment: 0.1 BTCPayment Address: To be provided at end of auction/in person.Shipping: Someone will meet you in person for this transaction as long as you are local to the USA.https://coinxc.com/static/1front.jpghttps://coinxc.com/static/1back.jpghttps://www.walletexplorer.com/address/1CAepSnHbASSc8McPA8abDLXvwHGEUju9x?from_firstbits=1caepsnhYour pics:https://coinxc.com/static/1front.jpghttps://coinxc.com/static/1back.jpgTry imgur for hosting your images, some provider block direct embedding of their uploads.Anyother very pretty coin, but yeah... get a trusted escrow.

comments.author: M-BTC
comments.body: That's a steep starting bid for a coin that's not in great shape. Also, can you take a clearer picture of the back? It might just be bad reflection but the hologram seems damaged.

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Uh... Yeah... I can guarantee you there will be zero bids over 2 btc for this.. Maybe a silver  ... Brass is looking rough, I know you want 2 btc but those are ebay prices, not this forum prices... Example - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2805807.0 Good luck, hope you auction it instead!

comments.author: rasengan
comments.body: This is a lot older now than that other one that was auctioned. If it doesn’t sell it’s ok but I just wanted to offer this to the market.

comments.author: rasengan
comments.body: As long as it is over 1.1 I will take the best offer/bid. We will have to do it via escrow if the price doesn’t reach 2 since it will be too expensive to fly to you!

comments.author: rasengan
comments.body: This auction is now over. Coin was purchased in a bulk transaction with the other coin for 40BTC.
